post:
Afterburst specializes in unmetered VPS solutions, check out our site @ http://afterburst.com/! We've been in business over six years with thousands of extremely happy clients, and yet we try to take a personal approach to VPS hosting


To celebrate being in business for six years and the launch of our new SSD cached OpenVZ VPS; we're offering a lifetime discount of 30% on all SSD Cached OpenVZ VPS (No coupon required)! The sale can be viewed here on VPSBoard, or at http://afterburst.com/sale


Why choose us?
Our clients love our service! We've got a list of feedback from clients both old & new on our website: http://afterburst.com/why-afterburst


All VPS's come with:
+ 1 IPv4 , 1 IPv6 (more IPv4 available with justification, unlimited IPv6 within reason)
+ Unmetered bandwidth on a shared 1000mbps port (fair usage policy: here)
+ Your choice of Linux distro - click here for list
+ SolusVM control panel (In-house Oxypanel control panel coming soon!)
+ 99.99% uptime guarantee & support SLA - view sla
+ 7 Day money-back guarantee : We know you will be happy! 
+ Global private network between virtual machines available on request
+ Pay via credit/debit card (via Stripe), or PayPal


Our New York VPS also comes with:
+ 10gbps DDoS Protection
Our Miami and Los Angeles VPS also comes with:
+ 3gbps DDoS Protection


Locations:


+ New York, USA
 - Looking Glass: us-ny.lg.afterburst.com
 - Datacenter: 101 Possumtown Rd, Piscataway, NJ (NY Metropolitan Area)
 
+ Los Angeles, USA
 - Looking Glass: us-la.lg.afterburst.com
 - Datacenter: Telecom Center, Los Angeles, CA


+ Miami, USA
 - Looking Glass: us-mi.lg.afterburst.com
 - Datacenter: 36 NE 2nd St, Miami


+ Nuremberg, Germany
 - Looking Glass: de.lg.afterburst.com
 - Datacenter: Deutscherrnkarree, Nuremberg
